definition[0]: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet
example[0]: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit.
example[3]: a large garden with fruit trees
explanation[1]: Fruit is used as a countable noun when talking about particular types of fruit
definition[1]: the part of a plant, bush, or tree that contains the seeds
definition[2]: if a tree or a plant fruits, it produces fruit
